nodes.text: A redbeast was a omnivorous scavenger and hunter that lived in the lower levels of Vandalar City. They lived in packs of two to twelve creatures. They were about one meter at the shoulder, with a length of two meters. They also had a one-and-a-half-meter bushy tail.

Redbeasts were remarkably hardy and adaptive. They were more resistant to poisons and extreme cold than Humans. Their jaws were extremely strong and filled with chisel-like teeth that could gnaw through most materials.
